name: Washington metropolitan area, District of Columbia, United States

records.notes: A Big Bus Tours Washington DC Red Loop open top double-decker was seen at L'Enfant Plaza in SouthWest Waterfront.
A Mount Pleasant bound WMATA Route 43 bus was seen at 9th St NW & G St NW in Penn Quarter.
A College Park Metro Station bound Shuttle-UM Route 104 bus was seen at Regents Dr & Campus Dr on the University of Maryland, College Park campus.
A Fort Totten bound WMATA Route F6 bus was seen at Campus Dr & N Library Ln on the University of Maryland, College Park campus.
